# streamsec Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "streamsec" {
  host = "app.streamsec.io"
  username = "myuser"
  password = "mypassword"
  workspace_id = "123456123213213123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String)
- `password` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
- `workspace_id` (String)
